mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) RESULT, NAME, POSITION FROM SPACE_MEMBER WHERE ID =#{id} AND PASS =#{pass} GROUP BY NAME, POSITION
update space_member set choicein=1 where id = #{id}
update space_member set choiceout=1 where id = #{id}

SELECT RNO, ID, NAME, HP, MDATE, TNAME, CNAME, CHP, CHOICEIN, CHOICEOUT ,POSITION FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNO, ID, NAME, HP, TO_CHAR(MDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MDATE, TNAME, CNAME, CHP, CHOICEIN, CHOICEOUT, POSITION FROM (SELECT ID, NAME, HP, MDATE, TNAME, CNAME, CHP, CHOICEIN, CHOICEOUT, POSITION FROM SPACE_MEMBER ORDER BY MDATE DESC)) WHERE (RNO BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}) AND POSITION=0

SELECT RNO, ID, NAME, HP, MDATE, TNAME, CNAME, CHP, CHOICEIN, CHOICEOUT ,POSITION FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNO, ID, NAME, HP, TO_CHAR(MDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MDATE, TNAME, CNAME, CHP, CHOICEIN, CHOICEOUT, POSITION FROM (SELECT ID, NAME, HP, MDATE, TNAME, CNAME, CHP, CHOICEIN, CHOICEOUT, POSITION FROM SPACE_MEMBER ORDER BY MDATE DESC)) WHERE (RNO BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}) AND POSITION=1
